name: Searching for Rest (itch)
description:
Help Nathaniel find his grave and Rest In Peace.

Controls are mouse only, you can also use space, p, or esc to open the pause menu which has instructions, an updating list of your game state, and a fast forward toggle.

If you encounter a bug please let me know!

Made in 5 days for Jame Gam #16 2022, 

Theme: Lost 

Special Feature: Girl in a Red Dress

All assets made by me except the font and one sound:

Font: Venice Classic https://www.dafont.com/venice-classic.font

Sound: 188034__antumdeluge__bones-2 on https://freesound.org/
